amendment.description: To improve the Armament Retooling and Manufacturing Support Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2548 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2548 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12785) To improve the Armament Retooling and Manufacturing Support Initiative.
